name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Staff Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in Product Development and delivering high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries. Skilled in **Java**, with a strong focus on **AI** and **Machine Learning** technologies. Expertise in data analysis and utilizing tools like **Amplitude** and **Looker** to derive insights and support cross-functional collaboration.
Demonstrated experience in both frontend and backend development using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven ability to build AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing.
Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, with a commitment to coaching and mentorship to develop team capabilities.

Conducted **Coaching** and **Mentorship** sessions, empowering junior developers to enhance their programming skills and effectively contribute to project goals.
Developed and integrated interactive analytics dashboards utilizing **Power BI** for visualization, enabling real-time data access for stakeholders.

Overall, emphasized modern software practices including **Microservices**, real-time data processing, and robust event-driven solutions to support high-volume transactional systems.

Leveraged **Java** to enhance backend services, ensuring robust performance in product development for a global e-commerce platform.
Applied AI and Machine Learning strategies to integrate intelligent features and improve user engagement through data-driven insights.

Fostered a culture of **coaching** and **mentorship** within the engineering team to elevate skill sets and enhance collaborative efforts across departments.

Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.

Applied role-based access control (**RBAC**) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring **GDPR** compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
